item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

Ok many new Commers are Posting Topics Like “Hell Damn HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEELP”.
Why you do that, this isnt needed, if you just post like “Need help with Dragons” for Example just post that and the Guy who views will know what its about.
And its more easy.

Read full topic
